name: pine-assistant
tagline: Let your agent handle customer service, bills, reservations, and more via Pine AI
description: Your agent creates Pine AI sessions, sends tasks, handles forms, starts execution, and reports results — all through the pine CLI. Negotiate bills, cancel subscriptions, make reservations, resolve disputes, and more. Built-in email auth flow — no env vars or manual token setup needed.

pine-ai.description: Pine AI account (Pro subscription for task execution). The skill authenticates via email verification and stores an access token, user ID, and email locally at ~/.pine/config.json.

persistence.description: The pine CLI stores authentication credentials (access token, user ID, email) at ~/.pine/config.json. This file is created during the auth flow and persists across sessions.
